tasks.label: Startup: 1 - Sync Preview Branch
tasks.command: echo 'Step 1/5: Checking preview branch...' && git fetch origin preview 2>/dev/null && PREVIEW_COMMITS=$(git log soheil..origin/preview --oneline 2>/dev/null | head -20) && if [ -z "$PREVIEW_COMMITS" ]; then echo 'soheil is up to date with preview - no merge needed'; else echo 'Preview has new commits:' && echo "$PREVIEW_COMMITS" && git merge origin/preview --no-edit 2>&1; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 'Merged preview into soheil' && touch /tmp/roundtable-merged.flag; else echo 'WARNING: MERGE CONFLICT! Resolve manually.' && exit 1; fi; fi

tasks.label: Startup: 2 - Clean and Kill Processes
tasks.command: echo 'Step 2/5: Killing processes and cleaning cache...' && lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:8787 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm clean && rm -rf .next .swc .turbo out && echo 'Cache cleaned and processes killed'

tasks.label: Startup: 3 - Install and Conditional DB Reset
tasks.command: echo 'Step 3/5: Installing dependencies...' && pnpm i && if [ -f /tmp/roundtable-merged.flag ]; then echo 'Merge detected - nuking and reseeding local database...' && pnpm local:nuclear-reset && rm -f /tmp/roundtable-merged.flag && echo 'DB reset complete'; else echo 'No merge - skipping DB reset'; fi

tasks.label: Startup: 4 - Dev Server
tasks.command: echo 'Step 4/5: Starting dev server...' && pnpm dev
dependsOn: Startup: 3 - Install and Conditional DB Reset

tasks.label: Startup: 5 - Claude Agent
tasks.command: echo 'Step 5/5: Starting Claude agent...' && sleep 3 && claude --dangerously-skip-permissions
dependsOn: Startup: 3 - Install and Conditional DB Reset
